name: zip(_:_:_:_:)
declaration: func zip<P, Q, R, T>(_ publisher1: P, _ publisher2: Q, _ publisher3: R, _ transform: @escaping ((data: Data, response: URLResponse), P.Output, Q.Output, R.Output) -> T) -> Publishers.Map<Publishers.Zip4<URLSession.DataTaskPublisher, P, Q, R>, T> where P : Publisher, Q : Publisher, R : Publisher, URLError == P.Failure, P.Failure == Q.Failure, Q.Failure == R.Failure
